external_references.description: Security Response Attack Investigation Team. (2018, June 19). Thrip: Espionage Group Hits Satellite, Telecoms, and Defense Companies. Retrieved July 10, 2018.

description: [Thrip](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0076) used PsExec to move laterally between computers on the victim’s network.(Citation: Symantec Thrip June 2018)
